changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE post ( post_number INTEGER NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, date_created DATETIME, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_postNumber PRIMARY KEY (post_number) );

changeSet.author: arsenii
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE post_details ( number INTEGER NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, date_created DATETIME, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, details TEXT NOT NULL, post_number INTEGER NOT NULL, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_detailNumber PRIMARY KEY (number), CONSTRAINT fk_topic_detail FOREIGN KEY (post_number) REFERENCES post(post_number) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );
